title: AE脚本-制作从右向左显示多行动画文字工具 Fade Up RTL v1.0
author: 大众脸
content: Fade Up RTL 脚本可创建一个文本层表达式，支持逐字符或逐词从右向左显示多行文本。其功能类似于 After Effects 内置的‘淡入字符’或‘淡入单词’预设，但专为从右到左书写的语言设计，适用于阿拉伯语、希伯来语等方向性文本动画。

other.description_en: Fade Up RTL script creates a text layer expression that can display multi-line right-to-left text one character at a time or one word at a time. Essentially, this expression works like the native Fade Up Characters or Fade Up Words text preset, but only for right-to-left texts.
